snippet: The latest proposal by the Obama administration to strengthen anti-Assad forces is a pragmatic one.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Obama administration's latest political initiative in Syria, which calls for withdrawing support from Syrian National Council to form new structure that will better represent country's opposition figures; holds while there is a risk that group will be seen as an American-made entity, pragmatic approach may help strengthen anti-Assad forces.
lead_paragraph: The latest proposal by the Obama administration to strengthen anti-Assad forces is a pragmatic one.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
